job description:
Job Description

Job #: 852209

We are looking to fill multiple Data Engineer opportunities for a client in North Phoenix, AZ. The ideal candidate will have a strong background with data migration, ETL reporting, moving and reporting data, and come from a financial/banking background.

To learn more please reach out to Chelsea Golden: or 480-368-2480

REQUIREMENTS
  • 6+ years experience developing, deploying and supporting high-quality, fault-tolerant data pipelines (leveraging distributed, data movement technologies and approaches, including but not limited to ETL and streaming ingestion and processing)
  • 4+ years experience with Java, Python, Scala or C++
  • 4+ years experience with distributed NoSQL databases and event brokers Apache Cassandra or Kafka
  • 4+ years experience with cloud-based data offerings (Amazon AWS, Google GCP, Microsoft Azure)
  • 3+ years experience with ETL Tools (Informatica, DataStage)
  • 2+ years experience in Reporting technologies (Business Objects, Tableau)
  • Experience with Agile Development Methodologies
